title: Pierre & Tim
description: This project is a small campaign for the cookie merchants Pierre et Tim. I collaborated with Emma Bibal. Together, we created a typography inspired by cookie dough, flyers, banners, and a promotional video highlighting the store. The tone is light and playful. The video was created using After Effects and Photoshop.

title: Insula Orchestra
description: This visualizer was designed to accompany a composition by the Insula Orchestra. I animated in 2D using Procreate, then hand-colored my frames with ink. During compositing, I added a texture to give the impression of sketches coming to life.

title: Ephemeral
description:
Surfing in the heart of texture, the body becomes one with the sea.

 "Ephemeral" is a hand-painted animated film created during my time at Gobelins. It shows the intimate bond between the surfer and the ocean. Frame by frame, I animated and performed compositing work to accentuate the textures of the painting.
